title: 15-Minute Hot Oil Noodles (You Po Mian)
directions: Boil the noodles according to package directions until al dente. In the same pot, blanch the leafy greens until cooked through. Drain.
Add the cooked noodles and greens to a heatproof bowl, along with the light soy sauce, dark soy sauce, vinegar, crushed red pepper flakes, salt, scallion, cilantro, and minced garlic.
In a small pot, heat the oil until shimmering. Carefully pour the hot oil over the bowl of noodles, and mix everything together. Serve!
ingredients: a handful of leafy greens (choy sum, spinach, or baby bok choy)
½ teaspoon Chinese black vinegar - **Sub balsamic vinegar
Crushed red pepper flakes, to taste
